name: MSHTA Spwaned by SVCHOST
description: Detects MSHTA.EXE spwaned by SVCHOST as seen in LethalHTA and described in report
note: **Detection Rule without Regex for better understanding. Be careful, this way is case sensitive:**`(process.parent.executable:*\\svchost.exe AND process.executable:*\\mshta.exe)`
